title: FS: N172 Old Judges from REA (6 left)
author: tiger8mush

posts.post_title: FS: N172 Old Judges from REA (6 left)
posts.post_content:
All but one are from the recent REA auction.  Clean lot with some VERY nice images.  I was only interested in a handful from the lot.  
$200 each or two for $350.  Prices include delivery.  Or would consider trades for 1914 CJs, other OJs, or Gerternrich/Gasslers/Holmes/etc backs.
email - [url]tiger8mush@yahoo.com[/url]
REA link: [url]http://bid.robertedwardauctions.com/bidplace.aspx?itemid=21704[/url]
